unlock(String) - Method in class rl.sqltrainer.domain.ExerciseSet
Checks whether the hash value of the provided password equals the hash value stored for the password within the exercise set, and tries to decrypt the solution texts afterwards if the password proved to be correct.
updateCurrExercise(String, String) - Method in class rl.sqltrainer.application.SQLTrainer
Replaces the maintained answer and solution texts for the current exercise if the new values differ to the old ones.
updateCurrExerciseData(boolean) - Method in class rl.sqltrainer.gui.SQLTrainerController
 
updateCurrExerciseViews() - Method in class rl.sqltrainer.gui.SQLTrainerFrame
Displays the data contained in the current exercise.
updateEnableState() - Method in class rl.sqltrainer.gui.SQLTrainerFrame
Sets the enable state of buttons and menus, modifies tab titles and adjusts divider locations according to the current state of the application.
USE_PLATFORM_LAF_CMD - Static variable in class rl.sqltrainer.gui.Commands
